name: Legacy of Kain: Blood Omen 2
description: First draft installer for Blood Omen 2 GOG

script.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Legacy of Kain Blood Omen 2/bo2.exe

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's installer provided by GOG

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Legacy of Kain Blood Omen 2/bo2.exe
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's installer provided by GOG
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: $setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
